name: Snek: Remastered
description:
Classic snake game - but with a twist - and improved! Combine up to 9 different gamemodes, as well as 3 speeds, 16 skins, 16 fruits, and multiplayer!

Gamemodes:
- Brick: Bricks generate, blocking your path
- Holey: Your snek has holes in it that you can go through
- Reversal: Your snek's head and tail swap each time you get a fruit
- Winged: The food moves and bounces off walls
- Portal: There is another fruit, every time you collect a fruit you will be teleported to the other one
- One direction: You can only turn in one direction
- Feeding frenzy: There is a *lot* of fruit, collect all of them to advance to the next round
- Solid snake: Instead of food there are enemies,  shoot them with your gun to stun them and then collect them while they're disabled
- Practice: Your snek can cross over itself and will wrap around when it touches a wall, you can't die!

Game controls:
- Pause: Enter
- Move: Arrow keys (P1) / WASD (P2)
- Boost: I (P1) / Z (P2)
- Shoot (solid snake mode): O (P1) / X (P2)

Menu controls:
- Move cursor: Left/right /A/D
- Change option: Up/down/W/S
- Mute: M
- Randomize: R
- Hide menu: H
- Increase window size: F11
- Decrease window size: F10

Note: Gamemode is enabled when it shows a checkmark.
Plus: Easy  texture and sound modding, assets are open source.
